# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(FITS_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(FITS)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
FITSPluginInfo.C
FITSCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
FITSPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
FITSMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtFITSFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
FITSEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtFITSFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${CFITSIO_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${CFITSIO_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IFITSDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IFITSDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IFITSDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MFITSDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MFITSDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${CFITSIO_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MFITSDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MFITSDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EFITSDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFITSDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${CFITSIO_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFITSDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFITSDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EFITSDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EFITSDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${CFITSIO_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EFITSDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EFITSDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases FITS ${INSTALLTARGETS})
